snippet: Chicago’s Corey Kluber struck out 13 batters, including seven in a row, in a 4-3 victory at Cleveland that ended a four-game losing streak.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Chicago White Sox defeat Cleveland Indians, 4-3; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Chicago’s Corey Kluber struck out 13 batters, including seven in a row, in a 4-3 victory at Cleveland that ended a four-game losing streak.

headline.main: Homer Lifts White Sox After Flurry of Strikeouts
headline.print_headline: Homer Lifts White Sox After Flurry of Strikeouts
